welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Colmenar Viejo, a charming city known for its rich culture and vibrant atmosphere. Get ready to explore its beautiful sights and immerse yourself in its local traditions. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at Barajas Airport, serving international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The second largest terminal at Barajas Airport, serving domestic and some international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The smallest terminal at Barajas Airport, serving mainly low-cost and regional flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: The main terminal at Barajas Airport, serving a variety of airlines and destinations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but it may be limited in some areas.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Torrejon AFB Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
